ValidationRule.description: The "Submitted" status cannot be selected if the previous value was also "Submitted".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE ( Status__c ) , 'Submitted'), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Draft') , ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Submitted') ) ), null)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please choose a different Status. The "Submitted" status cannot be selected if the previous value was also "Submitted".
